00031 
00032 namespace lbann
00033 {
00034   class target_layer_distributed_minibatch : public target_layer {
00035   public:
00036     target_layer_distributed_minibatch(lbann_comm* comm, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers, bool shared_data_reader);
00037 
00038     void setup(int num_prev_neurons);
00039     // Overrides regular forward prop; target layer doesn't involve sparsity, etc.
00040     DataType forwardProp(DataType prev_WBL2NormSum);
00041     void backProp();
00042     bool update();
00043 
00044   public:
00045     int m_root; /* Which rank is the root of the CircMat */
00046     Mat Y_local;
00047     CircMat Ys;
00048   protected:
00049     void fp_linearity(ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&) {}
00050     void bp_linearity() {}
00051   };
00052 }
